name: Alolan Diglett

evolution.description: Alolan Diglett can evolve into Alolan Dugtrio at level 8 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 15 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Mole Pokémon. Its three hairs change shape depending on Diglett’s mood. When in communication with its comrades, its whiskers wobble to and fro.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to Sandstorm damage. In addition, its AC increases by 2 in desert terrain, or during a Sandstorm.

abilities.name: Tangling Hair
abilities.description: Opponents within melee range of this Pokémon cannot take the Disengage action to move away.

abilities.name: Sand Force
abilities.description: During a Sandstorm, this Pokémon can double its STAB when it hits an opponent.
